title: Home - Hamilton County Public Health
cleaned_text: SERVING THE RESIDENTS OF HAMILTON COUNTY, OHIO Healthy Choices. Healthy Lives. Healthy Communities. Programs & Services Hamilton County Public Health has been helping to serve, educate, and protect the residents of Hamilton County since 1919. Here are a number of services and programs we offer for residents, businesses, and communities. [More Programs and Services](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/services/) [ Apply Now ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/lead/) Lead Hazard Reduction Program Funding is available to reduce lead paint hazards in homes built before 1978! This program is available for low-income families who have a child under the age of 6 years old, a pregnant woman, or where a child under 6 years old spends time. [ Request Here ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/services/for-residents/certificateordering/) Birth Certificates & Death Certificates Looking for an Ohio birth or death certificate? You can order one through Hamilton County Public Health! [ Learn More ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/covid19/) COVID-19 Information Visit our COVID-19 page for information on isolation, testing, vaccinations and steps to keep yourself and your loved ones safe. [ Submit Complaint ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/contact-us/) File a Complaint File a public health complaint about topics ranging from restaurants and swimming pools to open dumps and septic systems. [ View Forms ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/services/for-businesses/request-documents/ ) Find a Form Looking for a form, application, or trying to request a document? Find it here. [ Learn More ]( https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/services/for-businesses/programs/community-health-services-disease-prevention/) Community Health Services & Disease Prevention Our community health programs and services address immunizations, nutrition, physical activity, disease transmission, access to health care, and much more. [ Replace My Card ](https://hamiltonco.co1.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_6yuZWLzWdtUwFGC) COVID-19 Vaccine Card Replacement Lost your COVID-19 vaccine card? If you were vaccinated in the state of Ohio, Hamilton County Public Health will replace your card for free. [ View Results ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/services/for-businesses/programs/online-inspection-results-divisions/) Inspection Results Curious about the inspection results for places like pools, restaurants, schools and tattoo parlors? Find them here! [ View the Dashboard ](https://analytics.hcph.org/views/DRAFT_HCPH_COVID/HCPHCases?%3Aembed=y&%3Aiid=1&%3AisGuestRedirectFromVizportal=y) COVID-19 Case Tracker This dashboard (previously located on our homepage) tracks the COVID-19 cases across Hamilton County. [ View Reports ](https://www.hamiltoncountyhealth.org/reports/) Hamilton County Reports Staff collect and analyze data on personal health issues, diseases, and injuries that affect Hamilton County residents. Reports are available for public view and use.
